com.omertron.rottentomatoesapi

Class RottenTomatoesApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.omertron.rottentomatoesapi.RottenTomatoesApi

  • public class RottenTomatoesApi
extends Object
    Connect to the Rotten Tomatoes web site and get the rating for a specific movie
    Author:
    Stuart.Boston

    • Method Detail

      • setRetryDelay

        public void setRetryDelay(long retryDelay)
        Set the delay time between API retries when the account is over it's limit
        Parameters:
        retryDelay - milliseconds to delay for, default is 500ms

      • setRetryLimit

        public void setRetryLimit(int retryLimit)
        Number of times to retry the API call when the account limit is hit. Once this limit is hit an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        retryLimit - Number of retries, default is 5
